details: NRQL Lessons is a self-paced learning tool aimed to help New Relic customers improve their NRQL skills. Master NRQL (New Relic's Query Language) through a series of training levels using your own data.  Start from the very basics of NRQL syntax through to advanced concepts and querying techniques to become NRQL Ninjas!
whatsNew:
- Advance your NRQL skills through a series of levels of learning 
 - Control the data you see from your accounts with a simple Account Picker 
 - Copy or open the sample query in Chart Builder 
 - Resume from the last level/lesson the user was on
